episode: I lost my job during COVID-19 and struggled to provide for my family. It was a period of great shame for me.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I lost my job during COVID-19 and struggled to provide for my family. It was a period of great shame for me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds incredibly tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, it was a hard situation. Me being ashamed also added a layer of adversity in that it made me depressed.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like the shame was feeding into the depression, making it even harder to cope.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly. It was a spiral so to speak. I remember lots of people enjoying the pandemic and being locked down. I was not one of those people.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine. It's like you were stuck in a nightmare while others were having a staycation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, that's an apt description. The fact that the pandemic was going on didn't alleviate the feelings of shame I had for not being able to provide for my family.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The external circumstances didn't excuse your feelings of failure, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. I hate feeling dependent on others.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Loss of independence can be really tough on the ego.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is. I only stopped feeling ashamed when the lockdowns ended and I was able to work. It was truly liberating.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine the relief. Like a weight was lifted off your shoulders.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The relief was great. It was as if everyone was liberated and businesses were booming.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A fresh start, not just for you, but for the whole community.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep! I just put that turbulent period behind me and have never looked back.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Closure and a new beginning, that's great to hear.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was a scary time that I'm glad we're done with. The feelings of shame are gone!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a huge accomplishment, overcoming that shame.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I just put all those feelings into action.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You channeled them into a positive outcome.
